name: Puerto Rican Tostones (Fried Plantains)
author: Lymari
summary: Crispy fried plantains. A plantain is a very firm banana. Serve as side dish with your meal or as appetizers.
directions: Peel the plantain and cut it into 1-inch chunks
Heat the oil in a large skillet
Place the plantains in the oil and fry on both sides,; approximately 3 1/2 minutes per side
Remove the plantains from the pan and flatten the plantains by placing a plate over the fried plantains and pressing down
Dip the plantains in water, then return them to the hot oil and fry 1 minute on each side
Salt to taste and serve immediately
